page.title: 12ENTERTAINMENT IN TIDWORTH
page.content: By virtue of Tidworth being a garrison town many of the entertain- ments available to the populace are sports orientated. Amongst the games played are rugby,football,hockey,golf, squash,tennis,cricket,swimming and croquet. Motorcycle scrambling takes place on Chalk Pit Hill. Horse riding and its related activities is also popular. We have a cinema,clubs and bingo. The pubs and drinking places are always popular. Most gardens are well tended and there are allotments in both North and South Tidworth, controlled by the Parish Councils. Children enjoy using the many play areas and cycling especially with BMX bicycles is still a favourite pastime. During the year travelling fairs and a circus come to the village. There is an annual Carnival and Church events including a fete,Barn Dance and sales.
